statements: GRANT SELECT ON countries TO analysts;
GRANT INSERT, UPDATE ON government_officials TO administrators;
GRANT SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE ON countries TO managers;

GRANT INSERT ON government.agencies TO admin_users;

GRANT SELECT, UPDATE ON government.projects TO it_department;
